definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: But some experts cautioned that the science in the study is still very early.
sentences.chinese: 但有些專家申飭說，研究的學科仍在初期。

sentences.english: Ssangyong says it is in the initial stages of talks with potential strategic investors.
sentences.chinese: 雙龍稱，正與潛在戰略投資者進行初期談判。

sentences.english: Some cows slip their calves in the early stages of pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 有些母牛在懷孕初期小產。

sentences.english: Vaudeville was very popular in the United States during the early nineteen hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 在二十世紀初期，歌舞雜耍在美國城鄉深受歡迎。

sentences.english: It is a great political event in initial stage of the tang dynasty to abolish and set up the queen.
sentences.chinese: 摘要廢立皇后是唐朝初期的一個重大政治事件。

sentences.english: In the early time of product design, we will wholly convene a checkup meeting for it .
sentences.chinese: 在產品設計初期，我們會專門召開設計審查會議。

sentences.english: Yellow fever is difficult to diagnose, especially during the early stages.
sentences.chinese: 黃熱病很難診斷，尤其是在病程初期。

sentences.english: Paid to protect the adoption space grid arch to replace a work word steel arch in the early years.
sentences.chinese: 初期支護採用格柵拱架代替工字鋼拱架。

sentences.english: Early in 2009, the dollar appeared unstoppable.
sentences.chinese: 美元在2009年初期銳不可當。

sentences.english: In 1949, the average speed of China's trains was only 43 kmph.
sentences.chinese: 新中國成立初期，鐵路旅行平均時速只有43公里。

sentences.english: The super-smart-phone war is still in its early stages.
sentences.chinese: 超智能手機的戰爭仍然處於初期階段。

sentences.english: We have seen some early successes and also some frustrations.
sentences.chinese: 我們看到了一些初期的成功，也經歷了一些挫折。

sentences.english: Massification represents a major change in Chinese higher education in the early years of the 21st Century.
sentences.chinese: 大衆化是21世紀初期我國高等教育變革的典型表現。

sentences.english: because we're still sort of in the infancy of everything.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我們還是在發展的初期。

sentences.english: Early in your pregnancy, try to get into the habit of sleeping on your side.
sentences.chinese: 請在初期養成側睡的習慣。

sentences.english: The ore-bearing volcanic rock series formed in initial stage of continental rifting.
sentences.chinese: 臺礦火山岩系產於大陸裂谷作用的初期階段。
